reviews.content:
Going into safe mode makes your icons all move back to where they would be without the tweak - both on the homes screen and in folders.

A tad bit annoying as Boxy 3 didn’t have this issue, but still a good tweak otherwise.

The padding feature works along with saving presets padding options, as far as the custom icon layout, that didn’t work, wanted a 4 x 7 home screen layout and it never worked unfortunately. Still love the tweak though, hoping for an update soon.
iPhone 7 13.3. Shrinks my dock. No setting to fix that. Plus the icons match up to the lower right side of my screen.

Does not work well on iPad. Icons get forced off center and you can’t move them back. It also makes the dock hidden when the teak is disabled, but the dock works fine when the tweak is enabled. What a mess.
Customizing the number of icons in each Column/row does not work on my ip 12 pro max 14.3
Does not work well on iPad. Causes weird gaps of space.
